channel.title: Shooting games on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Shooting games on Game6r

item.title: Commando game
item.description: This time you have to face the enemy head-on and give him a proper rebuff. The game takes place in the impenetrable jungle, where the main task is to destroy the enemy base. A variety of weapons are available to you, there is even the opportunity to blow up enemy tanks. Well, an ordinary rifle will do for the infantry.

item.title: Game Shooting rpg
item.description: Shooting Adventure game will allow you to take part in the fighting during the First World War. Fight your way through the hordes of enemies on the Western Front, complete task after task, reclaiming the territory captured by the enemy. Don’t forget to look at the sky - the enemy can attack from there too. Use all available weapons to win the battle on the front lines.
